title: CUP Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 03 Field Assistant and Other Posts
description: Central University of Punjab (CUP) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 03 Field Assistant and Technical Assistant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech, Post Graduation, B.Sc, M.Sc can grab this chance and apply for the CUP Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on o...
